branchCategory.name: CKZ3N
branchCategory.description: <p>Power clamp series CKZ3N conforms to the NAAMS standard.&nbsp; The improved design reduced weight by up to 39% with aluminum body.&nbsp; The rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion, reduce weld spatter accumulation.&nbsp; The arm opening angle range from 15<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&deg; to 135</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">&deg; and can be easily changed by replacing the stopper body.&nbsp; Available in 50 and 63 bore sizes.</span></p>

branchItem.name: CKZ3N, Aluminum Body NAAMS Power Clamp Cylinder
branchItem.description: <p>CKZ3N power clamp conforms to the NAAMS standard.  The improved design reduced weight by up to 39% with aluminum body.  The rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion, reduce weld spatter accumulation.  The arm opening angle ranges from 15° to 135° and can be easily changed by replacing the stopper body.  Available in 50 and 63 bore sizes.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZ3N, Aluminum Body Power Clamp Cylinder Arm
branchItem.description: <p>CKZ3N power clamp arm comes in a variety of NAAMS standard designs. Painted arm is also an available option.</p>

branchItem.name: CKZN50/63, Power Clamp Cylinder Arm, X6013
